TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Padrangigrang, title = Padrangigrang, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Padrangigrang} }

S.FORM: Padrangigrang Itiniay i Taimali Cen no Taitung ko Padrangigrang a niyaro', 108 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 318 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 304 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 14 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 92%, Bunun 2%, Amis 1%, Tayal 1%.

Padrangigrang Itiniay i Taimali Cen no Taitong ko Padrangigrang a niyaro', 108 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 318 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 304 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 14 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 92%, Bonon 2%, Amis 1%, Tayal 1%.
